languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, наши авгуры засекли активные боевые действия на орбите и поверхности Ефрата-II. Мы попытались выйти на связь с флагманом Эксплораторов флота Осознание, возглавляющим осаду, но получили категорическое требование не вмешиваться под угрозой открытия огня по нашему кораблю".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, наши авгуры засекли активные боевые действия на орбите и поверхности Ефрата-II. Мы попытались выйти на связь с флагманом Эксплораторов флота Осознание, возглавляющим оборону, и в ответ получили требование не вмешиваться под угрозой открытия огня по нашему кораблю".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, наши авгуры засекли активные боевые действия на орбите и поверхности Ефрата-II. Мы попытались выйти на связь с флагманом Эксплораторов флота Осознание, возглавляющим осаду, но получили категорическое требование не вмешиваться под угрозой открытия огня по нашему кораблю".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Euphrates-II. We tried to contact the flagship of the Explorators of Cognisance Fleet that is coordinating the defence, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under the threat of opening fire on our vessel."

"Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Euphrates-II. We tried to contact the flagship of the Explorators of Cognisance Fleet that is coordinating the defence, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under the threat of opening fire on our vessel."

"Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Euphrates-II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the defence, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

"Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

"Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos augures ont détecté des opérations de combat en orbite et à la surface d'Euphrate-II. Nous avons tenté d'entrer en contact avec les Explorators du vaisseau amiral de la Flotte de la Connaissance, qui coordonne le siège, mais nous avons reçu pour seule réponse une interdiction brutale d'intervenir, sous peine de représailles immédiates. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos augures ont détecté des opérations de combat en orbite et à la surface d'Euphrate-II. Nous avons tenté d'entrer en contact avec les Explorators du vaisseau amiral de la Flotte de la Connaissance, qui coordonne le siège, mais nous avons reçu pour seule réponse une interdiction brutale d'intervenir, sous peine de représailles immédiates. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，扫描结果显示，欧夫拉茨二号星的轨道和地表爆发了战斗。我们打算联系真理开拓者舰队的旗舰，他们负责这颗行星的围攻工作，但他们发来了一份措辞强硬的要求，要求我们不要插手，否则会面临武装报复打击。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，扫描结果显示，欧夫拉茨二号星的轨道和地表爆发了战斗。我们打算联系真理开拓者舰队的旗舰，他们负责这颗行星的围攻工作，但他们发来了一份措辞强硬的要求，要求我们不要插手，否则会面临武装报复打击。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, unsere Auguren haben aktive Kampfhandlungen im Orbit und auf der Oberfläche von Eufrates II registriert. Wir haben versucht, die Exploratoren auf dem Flaggschiff der Erkenntnisflotte zu kontaktieren, welche die Belagerung koordinieren. Als Antwort kam jedoch nur die unmissverständliche Aufforderung uns nicht einzumischen — unter Androhung einer bewaffneten Reaktion, falls wir es doch tun."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, unsere Auguren haben aktive Kampfhandlungen im Orbit und auf der Oberfläche von Eufrates II registriert. Wir haben versucht, die Exploratoren auf dem Flaggschiff der Erkenntnisflotte zu kontaktieren, welche die Verteidigung kontaktieren. Als Antwort kam jedoch nur die unmissverständliche Aufforderung uns nicht einzumischen — unter Androhung einer bewaffneten Reaktion, falls wir es doch tun."

"Lord Captain, unsere Auguren haben aktive Kampfhandlungen im Orbit und auf der Oberfläche von Eufrates II registriert. Wir haben versucht, die Exploratoren auf dem Flaggschiff der Erkenntnisflotte zu kontaktieren, welche die Verteidigung kontaktieren. Als Antwort kam jedoch nur die unmissverständliche Aufforderung uns nicht einzumischen — unter Androhung einer bewaffneten Reaktion, falls wir es doch tun."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, nuestros augures han detectado un combate librándose en la órbita y en la superficie de Eufrates II. Hemos intentado ponernos en contacto con los exploradores de la nave insignia de la Flota Conciencia que gestiona el asedio, pero nos han advertido que no interfiriéramos bajo amenaza de represalia armada».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, nuestros augures han detectado un combate librándose en la órbita y en la superficie de Eufrates II. Hemos intentado ponernos en contacto con los exploradores de la nave insignia de la Flota Conciencia que gestiona el asedio, pero nos han advertido que no interfiriéramos bajo amenaza de represalia armada».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々のスキャナーが、ユーフラテス・IIの軌道上および地表における活発な戦闘行動を検出しました。包囲戦を指揮しているコグニサンス艦隊の旗艦に搭乗する探索者たちに連絡を試みましたが、武力による報復を警告する、強い語調の介入禁止通告を受け取りました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々のスキャナーが、ユーフラテス・IIの軌道上および地表における活発な戦闘行動を検出しました。包囲戦を指揮しているコグニサンス艦隊の旗艦に搭乗する探索者たちに連絡を試みましたが、武力による報復を警告する、強い語調の介入禁止通告を受け取りました」

languages.text: "Alametler Eufrates II gezegeninin yörüngesinde ve yüzeyinde harbî faaliyetler tespit etti Lord Kaptan. Kuşatmayı yöneten Malumat Filosu'nun amiral gemisindeki Keşiftörlere ulaşmaya çalıştık ama müdahale etmemiz hâlinde silahlı karşılık vereceklerine dair sert üsluplu bir yanıt aldık."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our augurs have detected active combat operations in the orbit and on the surface of Eufrates II. We tried to contact the Explorators on the flagship of the Cognisance Fleet coordinating the siege, but received a strongly worded demand not to interfere under threat of armed retaliation."
